content: Hello, I am working on FHIR Shorthand, a tool for profiling. I want to test the tool on some example profiles that use re-slicing, and I was wondering if anyone knew where I might find a set of profiles that do use re-slicing. I'm having trouble finding any examples to work with.
@Michel Rutten would you know?
I think there's an example in the test cases

The .NET FHIR API repo contains a large number of unit tests for the snapshot generator, including some (advanced) reslicing scenarios:
https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/tree/develop-stu3/src/Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Tests/TestData/snapshot-test
